title: Gingerbread man Christmas cake
description: I’ve embraced the cut out technique using an actual gingerbread man cutter to create this effect. Feel free to use one large gingerbread man or, depending on the size of your cake, a collection of varying sizes on one cake. I prefer to keep my gingerbread men looking quite classic, but again go to town on decorating them however you like. Coloured sweet buttons and candy canes are both popular choices.Equipment and preparation: You will need gingerbread man cutters of various sizes and a piping bag.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz mixed dried fruit, such as sultanas, raisins and currants
150ml/5fl oz brandy, plus optional extra to ‘feed’ the cake
finely grated zest and juice of ½ orange
3 tbsp black treacle or date syrup, optional
